casebody.data:
METCALF v. AMERICAN SCHOOL FURNITURE CO. et al. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. February 4, 1902.) No. 90. Appeal from the Circuit Court of the United States for the Western District of New York. Frederick Seymour, for appellant.

Before WALLACE, LAOOMBE, and SHIPMAN, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed in open court, with instructions to allow plaintiff 30 days to amend, on payment of costs. For opinion below, see 108 Fed. 909.
